title: KernelCI SAS Token Incorrect Permission Assignment Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows remote attackers to bypass authentication on KernelCI. Authentication is not required to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the permissions granted to an SAS token. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to make unauthorized changes to KernelCI build data.
addtionnal_details: KernelCI has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://github.com/kernelci/kernelci-project/commit/94be815f992f73e6ddc5dfdd4c6d458dc86cfce0
timeline:
2023-10-12 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2024-07-29 - Coordinated public release of advisory
2024-07-29 - Advisory Updated
credit: Nitesh Surana (@_niteshsurana) of Trend Micro Research
